channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A tree has fallen across the bridge across the small stream, 25th December
item.description:
A tree, c 50cm in diameter has fallen directly across the footpath where the path crosses from one field to the other, before joining the minor road to the west.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witcombe Roman Villa, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree has fallen right across the path (Cotswold Way), 25th December
item.description:
I can't be exactly sure of the location of the blocked path but it's roughly around the location indicated, on the Cotswold Way. the fallen tree has obviously been there some time as people have made a temporary path around it. It will require preferably a chainsaw to cut and remove it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buckholt Road, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees require maintenance, 25th December
item.description:
Trees bordering laxton road and the green lane footpath have not been maintained in many years and have grown very tall with overhanging branches. This poses a risk to parked cars and is blocking sunlight into gardens. Maintaining of trees needed. This was marked as resolved previously, however the height of these trees has not yet been resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land

item.title: Multiple large potholes junction, 25th December
item.description:
Multiple large and deep potholes on junction Hayden lane and to second house. Road in shocking state of repair. What3words ///quench.wooden.fame to ///mops.transit.cheeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish bags left on driveway at No. 10, 25th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Priors Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree blocking road, 25th December
item.description:
On road from Syreford to A436. Road totally blocked by fallen tree.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold

item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Button not working at crossing, only stays on if another button is pressed at a seperate crossing, 25th December
item.description:
The crossing on the greyhound side nearest to the 94 bus stop. The issue has been going on for a few weeks now, and you can only cross if someone at another crossing presses the button for you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Middle of the road, 25th December
item.description:
Between the junction to Winchester Way and Warren close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Warden Hill Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous flooding across road, 24th December
item.description:
There is persistently a dangerous flow of water, presumably flooding , across the road , worse when it’s been raining but it hasn’t rained for a couple of days and it’s still there. Extremely dangerous (lethal- my daughter almost lost control as it goes completely across the road) when it freezes as it has done a few times this winter. This has got worse since the building of the new road. Drainage needs fixing but in the meantime a plentiful supply of grit /salt needs to be placed so it can be put on when icy and it should be regularly included in the gritting schedule
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Old roadworks refill has sunk, 24th December
item.description:
Problem right across the toad and sinking and getting worse. Old roadworks have not been filled in correctly as its starting to sink and cause issues to cars suspension and wheels
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnmeadow Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large stretch of badly deformed road causing risk to PTWs, bicycles and pedestrians, 24th December
item.description:
From Oak Farm (GL51 4XB) down to South Park Lodge lane (GL51 4XD), there are large stretches of deformed road, with the road centre raised and creating ridges, steps and holes along the length of the roadway. This has been present for months but has worsened considerably in the last six weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped chest freezer outside 11 Goldsmith Road, 24th December
item.description:
This chest freezer has already had the motor removed, probably by a passing scrap metal merchant, releasing the HFC chemicals to atmosphere with their 1600x global warming potential.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Goldsmith Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.title: Pavement covered in mud, 23rd December
item.description:
Groundworks teams for the new school have driven mud from the field all over the pavement making it slippery and dangerous. Can this pavement please be cleaned regularly whilst these works are ongoing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Arle Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
